channel.title: Help with my server crashes
channel.description:
like every 10-15 mins my server crashes saying
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:182) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14383) at client.process(client.java:14367) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45)
pisses the hell out of me if anyone can help, i need a fix sometime soon...

come on… some one’s gotta know

item.title: Help with my server crashes
item.dc:creator: @xvikeax xvikeax
item.description:
@xvikeax wrote:

like every 10-15 mins my server crashes saying

java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed
at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:182)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:14383)
at client.process(client.java:14367)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136)
at server.main(server.java:45)

pisses the hell out of me if anyone can help, i need a fix sometime soon…
